product.name: Apple iPhone 13 Pro Max
product.description: The latest and greatest iPhone from Apple, with a powerful A15 Bionic chip, a stunning 6.7-inch Super Retina XDR display, and a long-lasting battery.

product.name: Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra
product.description: Samsung's top-of-the-line smartphone, with a powerful Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 processor, a gorgeous 6.8-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display, and a versatile quad-camera system, featuring rapid charging capabilities (up to 45W) and a long-lasting battery life.

product.name: Apple AirPods Pro
product.description: Enjoy superior sound quality, extended battery life, and seamless connectivity with Apple's AirPods Pro.

product.name: Amazon Echo Dot
product.description: The compact and powerful Amazon Echo Dot, featuring a compact design, voice control, and seamless connectivity with Alexa.
